Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2018 09:55PM Lalameadows wrote: Thank you for your reply. Your English is just fine. No worries there. Here's the thing. I'm a nurse. Have been for 25 years so I already know too much. Mostly just looking for others to talk to who can share their story and relate.
Posts.Title: Waiting for Biopsy Results Lalameadows Dyannah

Posts.Content: Lalameadows wrote: I'm 48 years old and had a needle core biopsy done yesterday. I won't get results until next Monday. All I know is the mass is 17mm in size and partially calcified. I know no one can diagnosis from that limited info but wondering if anyone could just share their experiences? I'm very scared and do NOT wait well Log in to post a reply
